database_manager

src.database_manager.erase_data()

Deletes the database file to reset all saved progress.

src.database_manager.get_player(name)

Searches for a player by name. If not found, it creates a new player profile with default scores and returns it.

src.database_manager.load_data()

Loads data from the pickle file. If the file doesn’t exist or is corrupt, it returns a default, empty data structure.

src.database_manager.save_data(data)

Saves the provided data structure to the pickle file.

src.database_manager.update_player(player_data)

Finds a player in the database by name and updates their record with the provided player_data dictionary.
